ui.chapter_mode_instruction: Select a slot above to see mods
ui.enable_direct_launch:
Enable direct launch for Ch. {chapter}?

Direct launch lets you start the game on a chosen chapter, skipping the main menu. On 'Launch', the game will open on the selected chapter.

Note: with direct launch on, 'Launch via Steam' will be unavailable.

This feature is unstable, use at your own risk!
ui.icon_file_path_placeholder: Path to icon file or leave empty
ui.file_replacement_desc: The mod replaces original game files with direct copying.
ui.patching_desc: The mod uses patching (XDELTA) to modify game files.
ui.mod_not_verified: Your mod is not verified and has some restrictions.
ui.no_mods_to_insert: No mods to insert into the slot.
ui.restart_message: Restart the launcher to apply language
ui.search_in_name_description: Enter text to search in mod names or descriptions:
ui.secret_key_important: IMPORTANT: Save this key! You'll need it to edit the mod.
ui.select_original_for_patch: Select original file to apply patch
ui.specify_save_path: Specify path to save the file
ui.verified_desc: The mod has been fully verified, and its creators are trusted.
ui.deltarune_desc: This mod is for the full version of DELTARUNE.
ui.undertale_desc: This mod is for UNDERTALE and will not work with DELTARUNE.
ui.deltarunedemo_desc: This mod was made for the demo and won't work with the full game.

files.update_file_label: {'Download link' if is_public else 'Path to'} {'.xdelta' if is_patch else 'DATA'} file:

tooltips.change_mods_dir: You can choose where the folder with mod files will be located.
tooltips.custom_exe: You can select your own executable file instead of the default (e.g., DELTARUNE.exe). Useful if it's in a different location or you want to run a custom launch file.
tooltips.full_install_instructions:
Install game files from scratch for DELTARUNE demo:
  ‚Ä¢ all needed files are downloaded automatically
  ‚Ä¢ a new game folder will be selected upon completion.
  ‚Ä¢ ATTENTION! If you want to run the demo
  ‚Ä¢ via Steam, you must select the folder STEAM created!

The checkbox is disabled after completion.
tooltips.macos_install_unavailable:
Game file installation is not available on macOS.
It's recommended to install the DEMO via Steam.
tooltips.online_counter: This counter shows the number of players playing the game via the launcher.
tooltips.steam: Enable this option to run the game through Steam, so that all your achievements, overlays, etc., work correctly.

dialogs.access_denied_detailed:
Access denied to file or folder:
{path}

Launcher failed to modify files. This is a common issue, here are possible solutions:
1. Antivirus: Disable it or add game/launcher folder to exceptions.
2. Admin Rights: Run launcher as admin.
3. Read-only: Ensure the game folder isn't read-only.
dialogs.all_slots_occupied: All slots are occupied. Free a slot before adding a new mod.
dialogs.corrupted_files_found: Corrupted files found, saved as .bak. A new list will be loaded.
dialogs.data_cannot_be_xdelta: DATA file cannot be an xdelta file.
dialogs.delete_collection_confirmation: The collection and all its saves will be deleted. Continue?
dialogs.delete_mod_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the mod '{mod_name}'?
dialogs.delete_save_confirmation: The save will be permanently deleted. Continue?
dialogs.direct_launch_macos_incompatible: Direct launch is not supported on macOS.
dialogs.direct_launch_steam_incompatible: Direct launch is not compatible with Launch via Steam. Disable it in Settings.
dialogs.enter_file_group_key: Enter key/name for this file group:
dialogs.full_demo_install: Full install of the DEMO game
dialogs.game_path_instruction:
{message}

Please specify the game folder. On macOS, select the .app file (e.g., DELTARUNE.app, UNDERTALE.app).
dialogs.invalid_game_folder: The selected folder does not contain a valid game version.
dialogs.invalid_key_message: The entered key does not match this mod.
dialogs.invalid_xdelta_file: The selected file is not a valid xdelta file.
dialogs.key_required_for_creation: Mod creation cannot be completed without saving the key.
dialogs.local_mod_deletion_confirmation: The local mod and its files will be deleted. This is irreversible.
dialogs.macos_install_unavailable:
Game file installation is not available on macOS.
Try installing the DEMO via Steam.
dialogs.mod_deletion_confirmation: The mod will be completely deleted. This action is irreversible.
dialogs.mod_must_have_files: A mod must contain at least one file.
dialogs.mod_on_moderation_message: This mod is under moderation and cannot be changed.\nWait for moderator approval, after which you can make changes.
dialogs.mod_version_too_long: Mod version cannot be longer than 10 characters.
dialogs.mods_folder_moved:
The mods folder was successfully moved to:
{folder_path}
dialogs.legacy_cleanup_message: The launcher has undergone major changes. Some settings were added, others removed or reworked. You will need to reconfigure the launcher to your preferences and re-download or load your mods.
dialogs.no_local_mods_message:
You have no locally created mods.
Create a local mod first.
dialogs.original_save_overwrite: The original save will be overwritten.
dialogs.overwrite_all_3_slots_collection: Overwrite ALL 3 slots in the collection?
dialogs.save_file_error: Failed to save file. Check folder permissions.
dialogs.mod_installed_apply_info:
The mod has been successfully installed!
Go to the Library to apply it.
dialogs.save_secret_key_instruction:
Now you need to choose a location to save the secret key file.
This key will be needed to edit the mod in the future.

IMPORTANT: Save the file in a safe place!
dialogs.shortcut_create_description: Press 'Yes' to choose where to save the shortcut.
dialogs.shortcut_description: A shortcut allows you to launch the game with selected mods and settings\nwithout having to open the launcher every time.
dialogs.steam_deck_compatibility_configured: The launcher has auto-configured save compatibility for Steam Deck (Proton). Your saves should be available.
dialogs.tab_extra_file_not_found: Extra file not found in '{tab_name}' tab: {path}
dialogs.tab_invalid_version: Version in '{tab_name}' tab must be X.X.X
dialogs.tab_no_file_url: No file link specified in '{tab_name}' tab.
dialogs.tab_no_version: No file version specified in '{tab_name}' tab.
dialogs.unsaved_changes_lost: All unsaved changes will be lost. Continue?
dialogs.update_permission_error_details:
Failed to replace launcher files due to insufficient permissions or file locks.

Try the following:
1. Close the launcher and run the installer as Administrator.
2. Temporarily disable antivirus/SmartScreen or allow the installer.
3. Install to a different folder (e.g., Desktop) and run from there.
4. Or download the update manually and replace the application.
dialogs.validation_url_error: Please fix an error in one of the links.\n\nInvalid format or file size for URL: {url}
dialogs.want_download_install_now: Want to download and install it now?
dialogs.what_do_you_want_to_do: What do you want to do?
dialogs.withdrawal_success:
You have successfully withdrawn the change request.
You can now make new changes.
dialogs.select_background_music: Select audio file for background music
dialogs.select_startup_sound: Select audio file for startup sound
dialogs.reset_settings_confirm_text:
Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values?

This action will affect:
- Game paths
- Customization settings (background, colors, music, startup sound)
- Library slots (installed mods will remain, but you will need to reassign them)

Unaffected:
- Selected language
- Installed mods
